name: dragons_of_tarkir
description: Huge Dragons of Tarkir-inspired package: Bolster, Exploit, Rebound, Dash, Megamorph, Formidable, and Dragon tribal synergies. Original template text (not card quotes).

Creature: Bolster {BOLSTER_N}.
When this enters, bolster {BOLSTER_N}. If you control a Dragon, gain {GAIN_LIFE}.
Megamorph {MEGAMORPH_COST}. When turned face up, bolster {BOLSTER_N}.
Formidable — At the beginning of combat, if creatures you control have total power 8 or more, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
When this enters, tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step if you control a Dragon.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, if you control a Dragon, put a +1/+1 counter on this.
Dash {DASH_COST}. When this attacks, bolster 1.
Exploit (When this enters, you may sacrifice a creature.) When you exploit a creature, bolster {BOLSTER_N}.
As long as you control a Dragon, this has flying and lifelink.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter attacks, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking.
Instant: Target creature gets +{PUMP_SMALL}/+{TOUGH_SMALL} until end of turn. Bolster 1. Rebound.
Exile target tapped creature. If you control a Dragon, scry 2. Rebound.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn. If you control a Dragon, you gain {GAIN_LIFE}.
Tap up to two target creatures. Rebound.
Sorcery: Bolster {BOLSTER_N}. Draw a card if you control a Dragon.
Create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens. If you control a Dragon, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your end step, bolster 1.
Creatures you control have vigilance as long as you control a Dragon.
Formidable — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if creatures you control have total power 8 or more, put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +{PUMP_SMALL}/+{TOUGH_SMALL}. When this Aura enters, bolster 1.
Enchanted creature has flying as long as you control a Dragon.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.

Creature: Megamorph {MEGAMORPH_COST}. When turned face up, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Exploit (When this enters, you may sacrifice a creature.) When you exploit a creature, draw two cards, then discard a card.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, if you control a Dragon, scry 1, then this gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
This can't be blocked as long as you control a Dragon.
Dash {DASH_COST}. When this deals combat damage to a player, you may return it to its owner's hand. If you do, draw a card.
Formidable — When this attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or more, draw a card.
Instant: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {TAX}. If you control a Dragon, draw a card. Rebound.
Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you control a Dragon, that creature's owner puts it on top of their library instead. Rebound.
Tap up to two target creatures. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step. Rebound.
Sorcery: Look at the top {LOOK_N} cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order. If you control a Dragon, scry 2 first.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. If you control a Dragon, draw a card then discard a card.
Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 as long as you control a Dragon.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets -{PUMP_SMALL}/-0 and can't block. When this Aura enters, if you control a Dragon, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has 'At the beginning of your upkeep, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.'
Activated: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has 'Whenever this deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.' Equip {EQUIP_COST}.

Creature: Exploit (When this enters, you may sacrifice a creature.) When you exploit a creature, target opponent discards two cards.
Megamorph {MEGAMORPH_COST}. When turned face up, target creature gets -{PUMP_MED}/-{PUMP_MED} until end of turn.
Dash {DASH_COST}. When this enters, each opponent loses {LIFE_SMALL} life. You gain that much life.
Formidable — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if creatures you control have total power 8 or more, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
As long as you control a Dragon, this has deathtouch and menace.
When this dies, if you exploited a creature this turn, return this to the battlefield tapped.
Instant: Destroy target creature. If you control a Dragon, you gain {GAIN_LIFE}.
Target creature gets -{PUMP_MED}/-{PUMP_MED} until end of turn. Rebound.
Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card if you exploited a creature this turn.
Sorcery: Target opponent loses {LIFE_MED} life and you gain {GAIN_LIFE}. If you control a Dragon, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you exploited a creature this turn, return that card to the battlefield instead.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life if you control a Dragon.
Exploit synergies — Whenever a creature you control exploits a creature, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has menace. When this Aura enters, each opponent loses 1 life.
Activated: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has deathtouch. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.

Creature: Dash {DASH_COST}. When this attacks, it deals {DAMAGE_SMALL} damage to any target.
Megamorph {MEGAMORPH_COST}. When turned face up, this deals {DAMAGE_SMALL} damage to each opponent.
Formidable — Whenever this attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or more, this gets +{PUMP_MED}/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
As long as you control a Dragon, this has flying and haste.
Exploit (When this enters, you may sacrifice a creature.) When you exploit a creature, this deals {DAMAGE_SMALL} damage to any target.
Instant: This deals {DAMAGE_SMALL} damage to any target. If you control a Dragon, this deals {DAMAGE_BONUS} damage instead. Rebound.
Target creature gets +{PUMP_MED}/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Rebound.
This deals {DAMAGE_SMALL} damage divided as you choose among up to two targets.
Sorcery: This deals {DAMAGE_MED} damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you control a Dragon, scry 2.
Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens with haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.
Enchantment: Creatures you control have haste as long as you control a Dragon.
Formidable — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if creatures you control have total power 8 or more, this deals {DAMAGE_SMALL} damage to any target.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has haste.
Activated: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Target creature can't block this turn.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has 'Whenever this attacks, it deals 1 damage to defending player.' Equip {EQUIP_COST}.

Creature: Megamorph {MEGAMORPH_COST}. When turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
Formidable — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if creatures you control have total power 8 or more, target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.
Bolster {BOLSTER_N}. Then you may have this fight up to one target creature you don't control.
As long as you control a Dragon, this gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Dash {DASH_COST}. When this enters, add {MANA_RAMP}.
Instant: Target creature you control gets +{PUMP_MED}/+{PUMP_MED} until end of turn. If you control a Dragon, it also gains trample. Rebound.
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Sorcery: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. If you control a Dragon, untap that land.
Formidable — Draw two cards if creatures you control have total power 8 or more.
Enchantment: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. If you control a Dragon, that creature gains trample until end of turn.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +{PUMP_MED}/+{PUMP_MED} and has trample.
Activated: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

Artifact: Whenever you cast a Dragon spell, you may pay {ACTIVATED_COST}. If you do, create a Treasure token.
{TAP}: Add one mana of any color. If you spent this mana to cast a Dragon spell, draw a card, then discard a card.
Face-Down Aid — You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast face-down creatures.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has flying if you control a Dragon. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Land: {TAP}: Add {MANA_SYMBOL}. Formidable — {TAP}: Add {MANA_SYMBOL}{MANA_SYMBOL}. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or more.
{TAP}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Dragon spell or a creature spell with megamorph.
{TAP}, {SACRIFICE}: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Instant: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Dragon card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

Creature: Megamorph {MEGAMORPH_COST}.
Dash {DASH_COST}.
Exploit (When this enters, you may sacrifice a creature.)
Formidable — As long as creatures you control have total power 8 or more, this gets +1/+1.
As long as you control a Dragon, this has flying.
Instant: Rebound. (Exile this spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast it from exile without paying its mana cost.)
Sorcery: Create a 2/2 colorless Dragon Egg artifact creature token with defender and 'When this dies, create a 4/4 Dragon creature token with flying.'
